net.datacrow.core.clients

Interface IClient

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBackupRestoreClient, IFileImportClient, IItemExporterClient, IItemImporterClient, IModuleWizardClient, ISynchronizerClient, IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ICalendarExporter, ItemImporterHelper

    public interface IClient
    A generic Data Crow process client. This client will be notified on events for the process(es) it has been registered against.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int _ERROR
      An error message type
      static int _INFO
      An informative message type
      static int _WARNING
      A warning message type

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCancelled()
      The process this clients listens to can ask this client whether the process should be cancelled.
      void notify(java.lang.String msg)
      The client is notified on a informative message.
      void notifyError(java.lang.Throwable t)
      The client is notified of an error.
      void notifyProcessed()
      Notify a single step has been processed (for example one item of the 100 items to be saved has been saved).
      void notifyTaskCompleted(boolean success, java.lang.String taskID)
      The task this client has been registered against has been completed.
      void notifyTaskStarted(int taskSize)
      This client is notified that the task it has been registered against has been started.
      void notifyWarning(java.lang.String msg)
      The client is notified of a warning.

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        void notify(java.lang.String msg)
        The client is notified on a informative message.
        Parameters:
        msg - received message

      • notifyWarning

        void notifyWarning(java.lang.String msg)
        The client is notified of a warning.
        Parameters:
        msg - received warning

      • notifyError

        void notifyError(java.lang.Throwable t)
        The client is notified of an error.
        Parameters:
        t - the receive Throwable / error

      • notifyTaskCompleted

        void notifyTaskCompleted(boolean success,
                       java.lang.String taskID)
        The task this client has been registered against has been completed.
        Parameters:
        success - indicates whether the task was completed successfully
        taskID - the task ID which has been completed

      • notifyTaskStarted

        void notifyTaskStarted(int taskSize)
        This client is notified that the task it has been registered against has been started.
        Parameters:
        taskSize - the total size of this tasks, for example the number of items to save. Used to track progress.

      • notifyProcessed

        void notifyProcessed()
        Notify a single step has been processed (for example one item of the 100 items to be saved has been saved).

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        The process this clients listens to can ask this client whether the process should be cancelled.
        Returns:
        cancel y/n
